name: Unveloped
description:
Join Anton and Garlo as they travel across the land to stop Angor, a black fairy who develops really bad games. Along the way they run into puzzle's, and Angor's minion's.

Travel across the 4 land's of Hopeful Hill's, Land of Heat and Death, ICE LAND, The Summit, and climb up the Tower of Creativity.key Features:
  • Auto saving after every level
Every time you complete a level, your progress is auto saved.
  • Use an Xbox 360 Controller
You can use your Xbox 360 controller in your adventure.
  • Replay a chapter
At any piont you can go back to a chapter that you have visted.
